name: FAudioRadialSliderStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an Audio Radial Slider

TextBoxStyle: The style to use for the audio text box widget.
CenterBackgroundColor: Color used to draw the slider center background
SliderBarColor: Color used to draw the unprogressed slider bar
SliderProgressColor: Color used to draw the progress bar
LabelPadding: Size of the padding between the label and the slider
DefaultSliderRadius: Default size of the slider itself (not including label)
